mapper.select: select r.id,r.user_id,r.content,r.createtime,r.parent_id,r.post_id,r.flag,u.id uid,u.nickname,u2.id uid2,u2.nickname nickname2,p.id pid,p.content pcontent from f_post_reply r left join f_user u on r.user_id=u.id left join f_user u2 on r.parent_id=u2.id left join f_post p on r.post_id=p.id
mapper.update: update f_post_reply set flag=0 where id=#{id}
update f_post_reply set flag=1 where id=#{id}
